Articles.Content:
Hello,

I have my first mission to set up a satellite. As you can see on the attached picture, i got the orbit correct visually. Apopasis is fine, I can tell you that the Periapsis is correct to. Inclination also should be fine so I guess I'm flying the wrong way, and so the Longitude of Ascending Node is in "negative"? Please tell me if I am correct.

https://imgur.com/a/Dd0bk

Best,
Cshaba

EDIT: The answer is yes.

Edited January 6, 2018 by Cshaba
Yes, you are flying in the wrong direction
